rawText:
SURESH 
KUMAR 
 
EDUCATION 
B.Sc IT 
V.H.N.S.N College 
 
       July 2015 - May 2018 
       Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu 
XII 
K.V.S Hr. Sec. School  
 
       June 2014 - May 2015 
       Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu 
 
SKILLS 
● HTML 
● CSS 
● Javascript 
● Bootstrap 
● PHP MVC Framework 
● React , Redux 
● React Native 
● Asp.net Telerik 
● Mysql , Sql server, 
MongoDB , DynamoDB 
● AWS , Azure 
 
CERTIFICATIONS 
Completed Certificate course in 
“Web Development Using 
PYTHON” 
 
Won first prize in web 
development competition 
 
Won second prize in web 
development competition 
 
sureshayyan444@gmail.com                    8760105087, 6383470896 
 
Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu                         LinkedIn
 
 
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
SEPTEMBER 2023 - CURRENT 
PHP Developer & MERN STACK DEVELOPER R 
Cloudb software solution pvt ltd  |  Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu 
● HEALTH FUND SYSTEM 
I developed a system using ASP.NET, Telerik, SQL Server, and AWS to 
manage personal records, dependent information, job history, comments, 
address history, and job classes. The system includes features like 
document uploads, company details, agreements, schedules, and 
processing screens.AWS for cloud infrastructure and SQL Server for 
database management. 
● CREATIVE DESIGN PACK 
An eCommerce website developed using React, Redux, and Serverless 
AWS services like S3 Bucket, DynamoDB, Cognito, Secrets Manager, and 
CloudFront. The admin allows create users, products, categories, and 
custom pricing for users. The user side includes login, shopping cart, 
product browsing, user profile, previous orders, and the ability to reorder. 
● BCC ERP Project 
I developed a system using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Redux, which 
includes features such as web login/registration, master pages for city, 
designation, state, and degree, and client creation for schools with 
employee mapping across multiple clients. Key modules include a 
monthly calendar, leave requests, permissions, to-do tasks, payroll, 
payslips, master and monthly trackers, and employee management 
● Magoprinpro & Vindini vysage 
I developed a system using React, Redux, MongoDB, and Node.js, 
featuring web login, master pages for various data segments, and a 
transaction management system for vendor creation, order placements, 
payments, and invoices. The platform also manages employee reports, 
check-ins, expense entries, and account year management. Key reports, 
including attendance, vendor, and payment reports, can be exported in 
PDF or CSV formats, and Firebase is integrated for web push notifications 
on new orders, payments, or expense entries. 
● BEEBOOK (Accounting Software) 
Billing software using PHP, MySQL, and the MVC framework. My role 
involves maintaining the system, implementing updates, adding new 
features, and fixing bugs based on client requests to ensure smooth and 
efficient operation 
FEBRUARY 2023 - AUGUST 2023 
PHP Developer & Hardware maintenance 
 
VVV & Sons edible oils ltd (IDHAYAM Oil)  | Virudhunagar, Tamilnadu 
● Worked on the EARMS ERP Software, developed using PHP, MySQL, and 
the MVC framework, providing updates and improvements on admin side. 
● 
Managed hardware tasks, including server maintenance and CCTV 
systems, ensuring smooth and efficient operations.

experience.description: Developed systems including a Health Fund System, Creative Design Pack, BCC ERP Project, Magoprinpro & Vindini vysage, and BEEBOOK (Accounting Software).
